Create a juicing recipe book that includes creative combinations of fruits and vegetables to mix things up and make juicing more enjoyable.
Develop a mobile app that suggests personalized juice recipes based on users' dietary preferences and health goals.
Host a series of juice-making workshops where participants learn how to create their own juices using fresh ingredients and innovative techniques.
Partner with local farmers to source fresh produce for your juicing business and offer farm-to-table options.
Create a social media campaign that highlights the health benefits of juicing and encourages people to share their own juicing experiences.
